author: jvanzyl
msg: - removing abstract modifier from initControlContext().

author: jvanzyl
msg: - removed the abstract modifier from the Texen task, now that a
properties file can be set you can actually do something
useful with the straight texen task. Simple, but useful.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o  fully javadoc'd
o  add the ability to set a properties file that can be used
to set non-critical values in the initial context.
o  when the values from the property file are place in the
initial context a check is made to see whether they are
numeric or not. If so, they are place in the context as
Integer objects, otherwise they are simply placed in
the context as strings.
